workMode.title: Work Mode
workMode.description: Select the work mode that suits your company
workMode.fixedHoursDesc: Employees work fixed hours daily without shift scheduling. Suitable for offices and administrative companies.
workMode.flexibleShiftDesc: Employees can be assigned to different shifts. Suitable for factories, retail, and 24/7 services.
workMode.confirmChangeDesc: Changing the work mode will affect how the system displays and calculates. Are you sure you want to change?
workMode.schedulesWillBeInactive: Existing schedules will be marked as inactive.

explanations.workModeDesc: Work mode determines how the system manages working hours and calculates attendance for employees. Choose the mode that fits your company's operations.
explanations.workModeTip1: Fixed Hours is suitable for offices and administrative companies with fixed working hours
explanations.workModeTip2: Flexible/Shift-based is suitable for factories, retail, and 24/7 services
explanations.workModeTip3: You can change the mode anytime, existing schedules will be preserved
explanations.attendanceDesc: Set up default working hours, time rounding rules, and check-in options for employees.
explanations.attendanceTip1: Configure late/early leave grace periods to avoid unnecessary penalties
explanations.attendanceTip2: Enable GPS requirement if you need to control check-in locations
explanations.attendanceWorkModeNote: In Fixed Hours mode, default working hours apply to all employees
explanations.payrollDesc: Set up default salary type, pay day, cutoff day, and payroll calculation rules.
explanations.payrollTip1: Cutoff day should be at least 5 days before pay day for processing time
explanations.payrollTip2: Standard working days affect daily/hourly salary calculations
explanations.overtimeDesc: Set up overtime multipliers, night shift hours, and overtime limits according to regulations.
explanations.overtimeTip1: Enable 'Use Legal Minimum Rates' to ensure compliance with regulations
explanations.overtimeTip2: Overtime limits help protect employee health and control costs
explanations.allowanceDesc: Set up allowance types such as transportation, meals, phone... for employees.
explanations.allowanceTip1: Mark taxable allowances for accurate income tax calculation
explanations.deductionDesc: Set up deductions such as insurance, tax, late/early leave penalties.
explanations.deductionTip1: Deduction order affects net salary calculation
